original: @ga  @#/_/gtor ma tshhogs mchod kyi dbu lags so//
analyzed: @ga  @#/_/gtor ma tshhogs mchod kyi dbu lags so//
translated: The beginning of the feast offering.

original: /bcom ldan 'das bde mchog la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/phyi rol gyi🔽mchod pa la/_chang byin gyis brlab pa dang /_chang gis mchod pa dang / lag pa byin gyis brlab pa dang /_lag pa mchod pa dang /_man+dal byin gyis🔽brlab pa dang /_man+dal gyis mchod pa dang /_dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab🔽pa dang /_dkyil 'khor gyis mchod pa dang /_gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa
analyzed: /bcom ldan 'das bde mchog la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/phyi rol gyi mchod pa la/_chang byin gyis brlab pa dang /_chang gis mchod pa dang / lag pa byin gyis brlab pa dang /_lag pa mchod pa dang /_man+dal byin gyis brlab pa dang /_man+dal gyis mchod pa dang /_dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa dang /_dkyil 'khor gyis mchod pa dang /_gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa
translated: Homage to the Bhagavān Cakrasaṃvara.🔽The outer offerings:

original: dang /_gtor mas mchod pa dang /_tshhogs byin gyis brlab pa dang / tshhogs kyis mchod pa'o/_/de la dang po chang byin gyis brlab pa ni/_thod pa🔽la sogs pa'i nang du chang bzang po ma nyams pa blugs la/_rang dam tshhig
analyzed: dang /_gtor mas mchod pa dang /_tshhogs byin gyis brlab pa dang / tshhogs kyis mchod pa'o/_/de la dang po chang byin gyis brlab pa ni/_thod pa la sogs pa'i nang du chang bzang po ma nyams pa blugs la/_rang dam tshhig
translated: Blessing the alcohol, offering with alcohol, blessing the hands, offering with the hands, blessing the maṇḍala, offering with the maṇḍala, blessing the maṇḍala, offering with the maṇḍala, blessing the bali, offering with the bali, blessing the gaṇas, and offering with the gaṇas.🔽Blessing the Alcohol

original: sems dpar bskyed pa'i mdun du bzhag la/_rang gi lag pa g.yon pa'i mthil
analyzed: sems dpar bskyed pa'i mdun du bzhag la/_rang gi lag pa g.yon pa'i mthil
translated: Pour excellent, undamaged alcohol into a skull cup, and so on, and place it in front of oneself generated as the pledge being.🔽Blessing the Hands

original: du om bsam/_de rang gi kha la gtad pas om gyi 'od zer gyis chang dam tshhig gi🔽bdud rtshir bsam/_g.yas pa'i mthil du a bsam a kha la gtugs pas skye🔽med kyi bdud rtshir bsam/_lag pa gnyis sbyar ba'i bar du hum bsam/_hu~m🔽las ye shes kyi bdud rtshis spyan drangs te chang ye shes kyi bdud rtshir bsam/_lag
analyzed: du om bsam/_de rang gi kha la gtad pas om gyi 'od zer gyis chang dam tshhig gi bdud rtshir bsam/_g.yas pa'i mthil du a bsam a kha la gtugs pas skye med kyi bdud rtshir bsam/_lag pa gnyis sbyar ba'i bar du hum bsam/_hu~m las ye shes kyi bdud rtshis spyan drangs te chang ye shes kyi bdud rtshir bsam/_lag
translated: Imagine that the beer is the pledge elixir.🔽Imagine that the beer is the wisdom elixir.

original: pa nyis kyis chos 'byung gi mu tra bcas la chos 'byung gi dkyil du ho dmar po🔽cig bsam/_ho las 'od 'phros ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas nam🔽mkha' la bzhugs pa dang rang dam tshhig gi dkyil 'khor dang gnyis ka snyoms🔽par zhugs pa'i byang sems chang la zhu bas chang dam tshhig dang ye shes kyi bdud
analyzed: pa nyis kyis chos 'byung gi mu tra bcas la chos 'byung gi dkyil du ho dmar po cig bsam/_ho las 'od 'phros ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas nam mkha' la bzhugs pa dang rang dam tshhig gi dkyil 'khor dang gnyis ka snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang sems chang la zhu bas chang dam tshhig dang ye shes kyi bdud
translated: Imagine that the beer is the pledge and wisdom elixirs.🔽Imagine that the beer is the pledge and wisdom elixirs.

original: rtshir bsams la srin lag gis chang la chos 'byung cig bri/_zur gsum la
analyzed: rtshir bsams la srin lag gis chang la chos 'byung cig bri/_zur gsum la
translated: Imagine that the beer is the pledge and wisdom elixirs.

original: 'bru gsum dkyil du ho/
analyzed: 'bru gsum dkyil du ho/
translated: In the center of the three syllables is ho.

original: de nas ho nas nas blangs te om a hum byas la spyi bo'i bla ma la gtor/_bla
analyzed: de nas ho nas nas blangs te om a hum byas la spyi bo'i bla ma la gtor/_bla
translated: Then, taking it from the ho, say om a hung and toss it to the guru at the crown.

original: mas sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob par bsam/_de nas rang gi lte ba'i hum sngo
analyzed: mas sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob par bsam/_de nas rang gi lte ba'i hum sngo
translated: Think that the guru obtains the spiritual powers of body, speech, and mind.

original: nag la thugs kyi lha tshhogs kyis bskor bar bsams te/_om a hu~m ho zhes gtor/🔽snying ga na a dmar po gsung gi ngo bo 'am lha tshhogs la gtor/_spyi bo'i o dkar
analyzed: nag la thugs kyi lha tshhogs kyis bskor bar bsams te/_om a hu~m ho zhes gtor/ snying ga na a dmar po gsung gi ngo bo 'am lha tshhogs la gtor/_spyi bo'i o dkar
translated: Then, think that the blue-black hung at the navel is surrounded by the assembly of mind deities and say om a hung ho.🔽Toss it to the red a at the heart, the essence of speech or the assembly of deities.

original: po sku ngo bo'am lha tshhogs su bsams te gtor/_phung po dang khams dang skye
analyzed: po sku ngo bo'am lha tshhogs su bsams te gtor/_phung po dang khams dang skye
translated: Think that the white oṃ at the crown is the essence of the body or the assembly of deities and toss it.

original: mched la sogs pa thams cad lha'i rang bzhin du bsams te gtor ro/_/de
analyzed: mched la sogs pa thams cad lha'i rang bzhin du bsams te gtor ro/_/de
translated: Think that all the aggregates, constituents, sense bases, and so on are the nature of the deity and toss it.

original: nas gnas khang la gtor/_rdo rje'i gnas khang du byin gyis brlab/_mchod rdzas
analyzed: nas gnas khang la gtor/_rdo rje'i gnas khang du byin gyis brlab/_mchod rdzas
translated: Then, toss it to the dwelling place and bless it as the vajra dwelling place.

original: la gtor 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchod rdzas dpag tu med
analyzed: la gtor 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchod rdzas dpag tu med
translated: Toss it to the offering substances and think that the offering substances are immeasurable mundane and transcendent offerings.

original: par byin gyis brlab/_mched dang lcam dral la gtor dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor
analyzed: par byin gyis brlab/_mched dang lcam dral la gtor dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor
translated: Consecrate the beer, and consecrate the hero and yoginī torma for the brothers and sisters.

original: mar byin gyis brlab po/_/chang byin gyis brlab pa dang /_chang gi mchod pa'o/_/🔽lag pa byin gyis brlab pa dang /_lag pa mchod pa ni/_lag pa g.yon pa'i
analyzed: mar byin gyis brlab po/_/chang byin gyis brlab pa dang /_chang gi mchod pa'o/_/ lag pa byin gyis brlab pa dang /_lag pa mchod pa ni/_lag pa g.yon pa'i
translated: Consecrate the beer and make the beer offering.

original: mthil du pad+ma 'dab ma lnga lte ba dang drug bsams la/_lte ba la om bam/_'dab ma
analyzed: mthil du pad+ma 'dab ma lnga lte ba dang drug bsams la/_lte ba la om bam/_'dab ma
translated: Consecrate the hand and make the hand offering: In the palm of the left hand, imagine a five-petaled lotus with a center, making six.🔽In the center, imagine oṃ vaṃ; in the east, haṃ yaṃ; in the south, hrīḥ mo; in the west, hrīḥ; in the north, hūṃ hūṃ; and in the northeast, phaṭ phaṭ.

original: gtor ma tshhogs mchod kyi dbu lags so//🔽la g.yon bskor du/_ham yam hri mo hri hri hu~m hu~m phat phat bsam/_de yang dang po dam
analyzed: gtor ma tshhogs mchod kyi dbu lags so// la g.yon bskor du/_ham yam hri mo hri hri hu~m hu~m phat phat bsam/_de yang dang po dam
translated: The torma is the beginning of the feast offering.

original: tshhig gi yig 'bru gnyis pa ye shes kyi yig 'bru spyan drangs la stim/_yig 'bru de🔽dag kyang om bam rdo rje phag mo dang /_ham yo na ma ni sngon mo dang /_hri mo rmongs
analyzed: tshhig gi yig 'bru gnyis pa ye shes kyi yig 'bru spyan drangs la stim/_yig 'bru de dag kyang om bam rdo rje phag mo dang /_ham yo na ma ni sngon mo dang /_hri mo rmongs
translated: The first syllable is the samaya being, and the second syllable is the wisdom being.🔽The syllables are oṃ vaṃ for Vajravārāhī, haṃ yo for Cāmuṇḍā, hrīḥ mo for Moharā,

original: byed ma dkar mo dang /_hri hri skyong byed ma ser mo dang /_hum hum skrag byed ma ljang
analyzed: byed ma dkar mo dang /_hri hri skyong byed ma ser mo dang /_hum hum skrag byed ma ljang
translated: hrīḥ for Pāṇḍarā, hūṃ hūṃ for Rakṣarā, and phaṭ phaṭ for Jāṅgulī.

original: gu dang /_phat phat tshan di ka du ba'i mdog can te/_lha'i ngo bor shes par bya'o//
analyzed: gu dang /_phat phat tshan di ka du ba'i mdog can te/_lha'i ngo bor shes par bya'o//
translated: One should understand these to be the essence of the deities.

original: de nas sor mo rnams la mtheb mo dang 'dzub mo dang gung mo dang srin lag dang 'the'u chung dang rnams la/_om ham/_na ma ni/_swa ha hum/_sgo shad he/_hum
analyzed: de nas sor mo rnams la mtheb mo dang 'dzub mo dang gung mo dang srin lag dang 'the'u chung dang rnams la/_om ham/_na ma ni/_swa ha hum/_sgo shad he/_hum
translated: Then, on the fingers, the thumb, index finger, middle finger, ring finger, and pinky, are the syllables “oṃ haṃ,” “na ma ni,” “svā hā huṃ,” “śa śa he,” and “huṃ ho.”

original: hum ho/_lnga ka 'dus pa la/_phat phat ham bsam/_yig 'bru de yang dang po dam
analyzed: hum ho/_lnga ka 'dus pa la/_phat phat ham bsam/_yig 'bru de yang dang po dam
translated: Think that the five of them are gathered together with the syllable “phaṭ.”

original: tshhig gi yig 'bru gnyis pa ye shes kyi yig 'bru spyan drangs la bstim/_yig 'bru de
analyzed: tshhig gi yig 'bru gnyis pa ye shes kyi yig 'bru spyan drangs la bstim/_yig 'bru de
translated: The first syllable is the syllable of the pledge, and the second syllable is the syllable of pristine consciousness.🔽The syllables are also the essence of the deity, which is seen as Vajrasattva, Vairocana, Amitābha, Akṣobhya, Ratnasambhava,

original: dag kyang ngo bo lha ste/_rdo rje sems dpa' dang /_rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'od dpag med dang /_mi bskyod pa dang /_rin chen 'byung ldan dang /_don
analyzed: dag kyang ngo bo lha ste/_rdo rje sems dpa' dang /_rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'od dpag med dang /_mi bskyod pa dang /_rin chen 'byung ldan dang /_don
translated: and Amoghasiddhi.

original: yod grub par blta bar bya'o/_/lag pa la gnas pa'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni/
analyzed: yod grub par blta bar bya'o/_/lag pa la gnas pa'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni/
translated: The four great elements that exist in the hands are

original: ltung byed ma dang /_gsod byed ma dang /_'gugs byed ma dang /_gar gyi dbang
analyzed: ltung byed ma dang /_gsod byed ma dang /_'gugs byed ma dang /_gar gyi dbang
translated: Bhūmi, Uḍḍāmara, Ānandevi, and Nartīśvarī.

original: phyug ma dang /_pad+ma'i dra ba can du blta'o/_/dpa' bo dang dpa' mo de gnyis
analyzed: phyug ma dang /_pad+ma'i dra ba can du blta'o/_/dpa' bo dang dpa' mo de gnyis
translated: The hero and heroine should be visualized as the father and mother.

original: kyang yab yum du byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/lag pa'i rgyab tu 'khor lo gsum
analyzed: kyang yab yum du byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/lag pa'i rgyab tu 'khor lo gsum
translated: On the back of the hand, on the three cakras,

original: la dpa' bo nyi shu rtsha bzhi gong ma ltar bskyed/
analyzed: la dpa' bo nyi shu rtsha bzhi gong ma ltar bskyed/
translated: generate the twenty-four heroes as before.

original: de nas lag pa mchod pa ni mdun rgyab rim pa ltar/_om ha/_om badzra
analyzed: de nas lag pa mchod pa ni mdun rgyab rim pa ltar/_om ha/_om badzra
translated: Then, the hand offering is as follows: In sequence, front and back,

original: pus pe a hum/_badzra d+hu pe a hum/_om badzra de pe a hum/_badzra g+han d+he a hum/
analyzed: pus pe a hum/_badzra d+hu pe a hum/_om badzra de pe a hum/_badzra g+han d+he a hum/
translated: “oṃ haṃ, oṃ vajra puṣpe a hūṃ, vajra dhūpe a hūṃ, oṃ vajra dīpe a hūṃ, vajra gandhe a hūṃ,🔽vajra naividye a hūṃ.”🔽With that, offer flowers, incense, lamps, food, perfume, and so on.

original: badzra ne bi te a hum zhes pas me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_mar me dang / zhal zas dang /_dri chab la sogs pas mchod do/_/nang gi mchod pa ni/
analyzed: badzra ne bi te a hum zhes pas me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_mar me dang / zhal zas dang /_dri chab la sogs pas mchod do/_/nang gi mchod pa ni/
translated: The inner offering is as follows:

original: om ha zhes rim pa ltar gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /
analyzed: om ha zhes rim pa ltar gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /
translated: “oṃ haṃ” and so on, in sequence, the goddesses of form, sound, smell, taste,🔽and tactility make offerings.

original: reg gi lha mos mchod de/_om sarba bi shi pra sa ra pu tsha me ga sa mun tra sa ma ye hum
analyzed: reg gi lha mos mchod de/_om sarba bi shi pra sa ra pu tsha me ga sa mun tra sa ma ye hum
translated: “oṃ sarva vīṣa pra sara puṣa me ghasa muṃ tra sa maye hūṃ🔽hūṃ.

original: zhes brjod do/_/de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa ni lha mo thod pa bdud rtshi lngas gang ba
analyzed: zhes brjod do/_/de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa ni lha mo thod pa bdud rtshi lngas gang ba
translated: filled with the five elixirs.

original: dpag tu med pas mchod de/_om a hum a mri te hum zhes pas mchod par bya'o/_/
analyzed: dpag tu med pas mchod de/_om a hum a mri te hum zhes pas mchod par bya'o/_/
translated: Offer with “Oṃ aḥ huṃ amṛte huṃ.”🔽On the back wheel, offer to each hero seed syllable hūṃ with the three

original: rgyab kyi 'khor lo la dpa' bo'i sa bon hum re la 'bru gsum gyis mchod de/_de
analyzed: rgyab kyi 'khor lo la dpa' bo'i sa bon hum re la 'bru gsum gyis mchod de/_de
translated: syllables.🔽Then praise with the eight lines of the father and mother, confess

original: nas yab yum gyi rkang pa brgyad pas stod/_yi ge brgya pas sdig pa bshags/
analyzed: nas yab yum gyi rkang pa brgyad pas stod/_yi ge brgya pas sdig pa bshags/
translated: misdeeds with the hundred syllables,

original: lus ngag yid gsum gyi 'khrul pa bzod par gsol/_/lus ngag yid gsum
analyzed: lus ngag yid gsum gyi 'khrul pa bzod par gsol/_/lus ngag yid gsum
translated: and request forbearance for the confusion of body, speech, and mind.🔽Request🔽empowerment of body, speech, and mind.

original: smin par gsol ba gdab dge ba'i rtsha ba ci yod pa sems can thams cad la bsngo/
analyzed: smin par gsol ba gdab dge ba'i rtsha ba ci yod pa sems can thams cad la bsngo/
translated: Dedicate all existing virtue to all sentient beings.

original: phan yon ni lus ngag yid gsum gyi sdig pa dag pa dang /_lus ngag yid gsum
analyzed: phan yon ni lus ngag yid gsum gyi sdig pa dag pa dang /_lus ngag yid gsum
translated: The benefits are that the misdeeds of body, speech, and mind are purified,

original: la byin gyis rlob pa dang /_zas nor longs spyod 'phel ba dang /_ma 'ongs
analyzed: la byin gyis rlob pa dang /_zas nor longs spyod 'phel ba dang /_ma 'ongs
translated: the body, speech, and mind are empowered, food, wealth, and enjoyments

original: pa na mkha' spyod du skye bar 'gyur ro//_//
analyzed: pa na mkha' spyod du skye bar 'gyur ro//_//
translated: increase, and in the future one will be born in Khecara.

original: man+dal byin gyis brlab pa ni me long gi ngos lta bu'i man+dal la om badzra b+hu me
analyzed: man+dal byin gyis brlab pa ni me long gi ngos lta bu'i man+dal la om badzra b+hu me
translated: The consecration of the mandala is as follows. On the mandala surface, which is like a mirror, recite “Om vajra bhu,

original: a hum zhes ma dal dang sa phyogs la byug pa bya'o/_/de nas om badzra re khe pad+ma
analyzed: a hum zhes ma dal dang sa phyogs la byug pa bya'o/_/de nas om badzra re khe pad+ma
translated: ah hum” and apply it to the mandala base and the area. Then, by reciting “Om vajra rekhe padma

original: ma da la hum zhes brjod pas pad+ma dang zla ba nyi ma'i steng du ri rab gling bzhi dang bcas pa ri rab kyi rtshe la gzhal yas khang dur khrod dang bcas pa/_'gron
analyzed: ma da la hum zhes brjod pas pad+ma dang zla ba nyi ma'i steng du ri rab gling bzhi dang bcas pa ri rab kyi rtshe la gzhal yas khang dur khrod dang bcas pa/_'gron
translated: maṇḍala hum,” on top of the lotus, moon, and sun, Mount Meru with the four continents, the perimeter of Mount Meru, the celestial mansion, and the charnel grounds,

original: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang chos skyong ba'i bsrungs ma dang bcas
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang chos skyong ba'i bsrungs ma dang bcas
translated: the continents, and the surrounding iron mountains are generated, along with the buddhas, dharma, and sangha, and the protectors of the dharma.🔽Recite “Om ham maha bhirana ma” three times to generate the central continent.

original: pa bskyed do/_/ om ham ma ha b+hi ra na ma lan gsum gyis dbus su dbul/_/_yo sarba bi re🔽ya na ma shar du lus 'phags po/_om ram dzam pu ris na ma/_lhor 'dzam bu
analyzed: pa bskyed do/_/ om ham ma ha b+hi ra na ma lan gsum gyis dbus su dbul/_/_yo sarba bi re ya na ma shar du lus 'phags po/_om ram dzam pu ris na ma/_lhor 'dzam bu
translated: “ Om yosarva bired🔽ayana ma” generates Videha in the east.🔽“ Om ram jampuri na ma” generates Jambudvīpa in the south.🔽“ Om lo aparahoye na ma” generates Godānīya in the west.🔽“ Om bam kuta kuta

original: gling /_o lo a pa ra ho ye na ma/_nub tu ba lang spyod/_om bam ku ta ku te
analyzed: gling /_o lo a pa ra ho ye na ma/_nub tu ba lang spyod/_om bam ku ta ku te
translated: na ma” generates Kuru in the north.

original: na ma/_byang du sgra mi snyan/_a+o~m ya u pa de ba ya na ma/_shar gyi g.yas skor
analyzed: na ma/_byang du sgra mi snyan/_a+o~m ya u pa de ba ya na ma/_shar gyi g.yas skor
translated: The right side of the east.

original: gtor ma tshhogs mchod kyi dbu lags so//
analyzed: gtor ma tshhogs mchod kyi dbu lags so//
translated: The beginning of the bali and ganachakra offering.

original: gnyis su me tog re/_lan gsum gsum gyis dbul/_om ra u pa de pa ya na
analyzed: gnyis su me tog re/_lan gsum gsum gyis dbul/_om ra u pa de pa ya na
translated: In the two [places], put a flower each, and offer three times each.🔽Om ra upad eva yana ma.

original: ma/_lho'i g.yas g.yon gnyis su lan gsum gsum gyis me tog re dgod/🔽o la u pa de ba ya na ma nub kyi g.yas g.yon gnyis su lan gsum gsum gyis
analyzed: ma/_lho'i g.yas g.yon gnyis su lan gsum gsum gyis me tog re dgod/ o la u pa de ba ya na ma nub kyi g.yas g.yon gnyis su lan gsum gsum gyis
translated: In the two right and left sides of the south, put a flower each three times.🔽Om la upad eva yana ma. In the two right and left sides of the west, put a flower each three times.

original: me tog re dgod/_om ba u pa d+hi pa ya na ma byang gi g.yas g.yon gnyis su me
analyzed: me tog re dgod/_om ba u pa d+hi pa ya na ma byang gi g.yas g.yon gnyis su me
translated: Om va upad eva yana ma. In the two right and left sides of the north, put a flower each three times.

original: tog re lan gsum gsum gyis dgod/_de nas nang gi phyogs dang mtshhams su/🔽a+o ya ga dza rad na ya na ma/_shar glang po che/_o ra su sha rad na ya na ma/
analyzed: tog re lan gsum gsum gyis dgod/_de nas nang gi phyogs dang mtshhams su/ a+o ya ga dza rad na ya na ma/_shar glang po che/_o ra su sha rad na ya na ma/
translated: Then, in the inner directions and intermediate directions,🔽Om ya ga ja radna yana ma. In the east, the elephant. Om ra su sha radna yana ma.

original: lho blon po/_o la a sha rad na ya na ma/_nub tu rta mchog_/om pam shri rad
analyzed: lho blon po/_o la a sha rad na ya na ma/_nub tu rta mchog_/om pam shri rad
translated: In the south, the minister. Om la a sha radna yana ma. In the west, the supreme horse. Om pam shri rad🔽na yana ma. In the north, the general.

original: na ya na ma/_byang rin po che/_om ya khad ga rad na ya na ma/_shar lho rgyal po/
analyzed: na ya na ma/_byang rin po che/_om ya khad ga rad na ya na ma/_shar lho rgyal po/
translated: 11. Namya🔽namah,🔽12. Oṃ ya kha ga raṇa ya namah,

original: a+o~m ra ma ni rad na ya na ma/_lho nub tu btshun mo/_a+o~m tshakra ya na ma/_nub
analyzed: a+o~m ra ma ni rad na ya na ma/_lho nub tu btshun mo/_a+o~m tshakra ya na ma/_nub
translated: 13. Oṃ ra ma ni raṇa ya namah,🔽14. Oṃ tsa kra ya namah,🔽15. Oṃ sarva ni sbyo raṇa ya namah,

original: byang 'khor lo/_om sarba ni sbyo rad na ya na ma/_byang shar gter chen po/
analyzed: byang 'khor lo/_om sarba ni sbyo rad na ya na ma/_byang shar gter chen po/
translated: 16. Oṃ su rya ya namah,🔽17. Oṃ tsaṇ dra ya namah.

original: om sur+ya ya na ma/_a+o~m tshan dra ya na ma/_nyi zla gnyis lan gsum gsum gyis me🔽tog re dbul lo/_/gling bzhi gling phran brgyad  dbus kyi ri bo mchog rab rol
analyzed: om sur+ya ya na ma/_a+o~m tshan dra ya na ma/_nyi zla gnyis lan gsum gsum gyis me tog re dbul lo/_/gling bzhi gling phran brgyad  dbus kyi ri bo mchog rab rol
translated: Offer a flower for each of the sun and moon.

original: pa'i mtshho bdun phyi'i lcags ri nag po dang bcas pa phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi🔽mchod pas gang bar byin gyis brlab po/_/'bul ba ni yi dam gyi lha la phyi nang
analyzed: pa'i mtshho bdun phyi'i lcags ri nag po dang bcas pa phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi mchod pas gang bar byin gyis brlab po/_/'bul ba ni yi dam gyi lha la phyi nang
translated: Bless the four continents, the eight subcontinents, Mount Meru, the seven jeweled mountain ranges, the outer black iron mountain range, and the outer, inner, and secret offerings as being filled with offerings.🔽Offer them to the meditation deity by emanating outer, inner, and secret offerings.

original: gsang ba gsum gyis gang bar sprul te dbul/_bla ma dang mkha' 'gro la yang de
analyzed: gsang ba gsum gyis gang bar sprul te dbul/_bla ma dang mkha' 'gro la yang de
translated: Offer them to the guru and dakini as well.

original: ltar sbyar ro/_/de nas mchod stod gnyis/_bshags bsdam gnyis/_gsol sngo
analyzed: ltar sbyar ro/_/de nas mchod stod gnyis/_bshags bsdam gnyis/_gsol sngo
translated: Then, do the two offerings and the two supplications, the two confessions and the two vows, the two requests and the two dedications.

original: gnyis sku rang gnyis rgyas par bya'o/_/phan yon ni dpag tu med do /_//🔽lus kyi dkyil 'khor ni/_'byung bzhi rang sar dag pa/_pam las pad+ma a
analyzed: gnyis sku rang gnyis rgyas par bya'o/_/phan yon ni dpag tu med do /_// lus kyi dkyil 'khor ni/_'byung bzhi rang sar dag pa/_pam las pad+ma a
translated: The benefits are immeasurable.🔽The body mandala is the purification of the four elements in their own place.🔽From pam comes a lotus, from a a moon, and from ram a sun.

original: las zla ba ram las nyi ma'i steng du rang gi lus yul nyi shu rtsha bzhi'i rang bzhin du
analyzed: las zla ba ram las nyi ma'i steng du rang gi lus yul nyi shu rtsha bzhi'i rang bzhin du
translated: Upon that, think that one’s body is the nature of the twenty-four sacred sites.

original: bsam ste/_pu dza u/_a ku ra/_de ma ka_/o ki o/_ka la ka_/hab sra g+hi/_so bu
analyzed: bsam ste/_pu dza u/_a ku ra/_de ma ka_/o ki o/_ka la ka_/hab sra g+hi/_so bu
translated: Recite pu ja u, a ku ra, de ma ka, o ki o, ka la ka, hab sa gha, so bu🔽ma, si ma ku three times.

original: ma/_si ma ku zhes lan gsum brjod pas yul na nyi shu rtsha bzhi sa na bcur bsam🔽par bya'o/_/de nas skad cig gis stong pa'i rjes yo las rlung ram las me/_bam las
analyzed: ma/_si ma ku zhes lan gsum brjod pas yul na nyi shu rtsha bzhi sa na bcur bsam par bya'o/_/de nas skad cig gis stong pa'i rjes yo las rlung ram las me/_bam las
translated: Think that the twenty-four sacred sites are gathered into the ten.🔽After that, instantly after emptiness, from yo comes wind, from ram comes fire, from vaṃ comes water, from laṃ comes earth, and from bhrūṃ comes the celestial mansion.

original: chu lam las sa bru las gzhal yas khang bskyed pa'i nang du pam las pad+ma a las zla ba
analyzed: chu lam las sa bru las gzhal yas khang bskyed pa'i nang du pam las pad+ma a las zla ba
translated: Within that, from pam comes a lotus, from a a moon,

original: ma las nyi ma'i steng du hum bam 'dus pa las yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa bskyed
analyzed: ma las nyi ma'i steng du hum bam 'dus pa las yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa bskyed
translated: From ma arises a sun, upon which is a syllable hum, which becomes the father and mother with their retinue.

original: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab/_go rdzogs par bgo'/
analyzed: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab/_go rdzogs par bgo'/
translated: Bless the body, speech, and mind, and put on the armor.

original: de nas rang dam tshhig sems dpa' thugs ka'i hum las 'od zer 'phros te/
analyzed: de nas rang dam tshhig sems dpa' thugs ka'i hum las 'od zer 'phros te/
translated: Then, from the hum at the heart of the pledge being, light radiates

original: ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs la nam mkha' la bzhugs pa la rang gi lus stong
analyzed: ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs la nam mkha' la bzhugs pa la rang gi lus stong
translated: and invites the wisdom wheel to come and sit in the sky.🔽Imagine that your body fills the great trichiliocosm, and say:

original: gsum gyi stong chen po gang bar dmigs te ngag tu a+o~m na ma sarba ta tha ga ta b+han d+ha
analyzed: gsum gyi stong chen po gang bar dmigs te ngag tu a+o~m na ma sarba ta tha ga ta b+han d+ha
translated: Om nama sarva tathagata bhandana karomi🔽With that, make prostrations. Then, make the five offerings:

original: na ka ro mi zhes pas phyag bya/_de nas rnam lnga dbul te/_a+o~m badzra pus pe a hum
analyzed: na ka ro mi zhes pas phyag bya/_de nas rnam lnga dbul te/_a+o~m badzra pus pe a hum
translated: Om vajra puspe ah hum

original: zhes pas me tog dbu la/_gdug spos shangs la/_mar me spyan la/_zhal
analyzed: zhes pas me tog dbu la/_gdug spos shangs la/_mar me spyan la/_zhal
translated: With that, offer flowers to the head, incense to the nose, lamps to the eyes,

original: zas zhal du/_dri chab thugs kar dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas yab kyi rkang pa
analyzed: zas zhal du/_dri chab thugs kar dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas yab kyi rkang pa
translated: food to the tongue, and perfume to the heart.🔽Then, with the eight lines of the father and the eight lines of the mother, praise.

original: brgyad pa dang yum gyi rkang pa brgyad pas bstod/_om pad+ma ka ma le swa ha lha rang
analyzed: brgyad pa dang yum gyi rkang pa brgyad pas bstod/_om pad+ma ka ma le swa ha lha rang
translated: Om padma kamale soha

original: rang gi gnas su bzhugs su gsol/_de nas mchod bstod gnyis/_bshags
analyzed: rang gi gnas su bzhugs su gsol/_de nas mchod bstod gnyis/_bshags
translated: Request them to remain in their places.

original: bsdam gnyis/_gsol sngo gnyis rjes bskur gnyis so/_/stod pa spyi ni bla ma
analyzed: bsdam gnyis/_gsol sngo gnyis rjes bskur gnyis so/_/stod pa spyi ni bla ma
translated: Then, there are the two sections of offering and praise, the two sections of confession and restraint, the two sections of supplicating and dedication, and the two sections of the subsequent authorizations.

original: brgyud pa dang bcas pa la bstod pa dang /_'gron gsum la bstod pa spyi'o/_/🔽bye brag gi stod pa ni dpa' bo thams cad yab kyi rkang brgyad du bsdus/_dpa'
analyzed: brgyud pa dang bcas pa la bstod pa dang /_'gron gsum la bstod pa spyi'o/_/ bye brag gi stod pa ni dpa' bo thams cad yab kyi rkang brgyad du bsdus/_dpa'
translated: The general praise is the praise to the guru and lineage, and the general praise to the three guests.

original: mo thams cad yum gyi rkang brgyad du bsdus te bstod pa'o/_/mchod pa ni rang
analyzed: mo thams cad yum gyi rkang brgyad du bsdus te bstod pa'o/_/mchod pa ni rang
translated: The specific praise is the praise that includes all heroes in the eight lines of the father and includes all heroines in the eight lines of the mother.

original: dam tshhig gi dkyil 'khor du bskyed pa'i zla ba'i steng gi hum las mchod pa'i lha mo🔽spros te/_a+o~m badzra pus pe a hum/_zhes pas rnam lnga dbul te/_me tog dbul/
analyzed: dam tshhig gi dkyil 'khor du bskyed pa'i zla ba'i steng gi hum las mchod pa'i lha mo spros te/_a+o~m badzra pus pe a hum/_zhes pas rnam lnga dbul te/_me tog dbul/
translated: The offering is the offering goddesses emanated from the hūṃ on the moon above the self-visualization in the maṇḍala of the pledge beings.🔽Om vajra puṣpe aḥ hūṃ

original: bdug spos shangs la/_mar me spyan la/_zhal zas zhal du/_rol mo snyan la/
analyzed: bdug spos shangs la/_mar me spyan la/_zhal zas zhal du/_rol mo snyan la/
translated: Offer the five: Offer flowers, incense to the nose, lamps to the eyes, food to the mouth, music to the ears,🔽and perfume to the heart.

original: dri chab thugs kar dbul lo/_/yang snying ga'i hum las gzugs rdo rje ma dang /
analyzed: dri chab thugs kar dbul lo/_/yang snying ga'i hum las gzugs rdo rje ma dang /
translated: Again, from the hūṃ in the heart, Rūpavajrā and so on emanate and make offerings.

original: gtor ma tshhogs mchod kyi dbu lags so//
analyzed: gtor ma tshhogs mchod kyi dbu lags so//
translated: This is the beginning of the feast offering.

original: sgra rdo rje ma dang /_dri rdo rje dang /_ro rdo rje ma dang /_reg rdo rje ma spros te/
analyzed: sgra rdo rje ma dang /_dri rdo rje dang /_ro rdo rje ma dang /_reg rdo rje ma spros te/
translated: Then emanate Shabdavajra, Gandhavajra, Rasavajra, and Sparshavajra.

original: om sarba bi sha sra sa ra pu tsha me ga sa mu tra a hum des dbul lo/_/de kho na'i mchod
analyzed: om sarba bi sha sra sa ra pu tsha me ga sa mu tra a hum des dbul lo/_/de kho na'i mchod
translated: With the mantra Om sarva-bhisha sarva-puryasame ghasa-mudra a hum, make the offering.

original: pa lha mo thod pa bdud rtshi lngas gang ba thogs pa dpag tu med pa yang sngags des🔽dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas mkha' 'gro ma bzhi dang /_sku gsung thugs la
analyzed: pa lha mo thod pa bdud rtshi lngas gang ba thogs pa dpag tu med pa yang sngags des dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas mkha' 'gro ma bzhi dang /_sku gsung thugs la
translated: With that mantra, make offerings to the goddesses who hold skull cups filled with the five elixirs.

original: sogs pa sgo 'tshhams ma thams cad la yang rgyas pa ltar mchod na gong ma ltar sbyar
analyzed: sogs pa sgo 'tshhams ma thams cad la yang rgyas pa ltar mchod na gong ma ltar sbyar
translated: Then, to the four dakinis, the door guardians, and so forth, if you make offerings according to the extensive version, apply it as above.

original: ro/_/bsdus pa ltar mchod na om a hum gis gsham du mchod pa gsum sbyar
analyzed: ro/_/bsdus pa ltar mchod na om a hum gis gsham du mchod pa gsum sbyar
translated: If you make offerings according to the concise version, apply the three offerings to the end of Om Ah Hum.

original: bas mchod do/_/de nas sdig pa bshags pa ni sngar byas pa la 'gyod pa bskyed/
analyzed: bas mchod do/_/de nas sdig pa bshags pa ni sngar byas pa la 'gyod pa bskyed/
translated: Then, for the confession of sins, generate regret for what you have done in the past,

original: da ltar ba bshags/_phyis srog la bab kyang mi byed par dam bca'o/_/rgyun
analyzed: da ltar ba bshags/_phyis srog la bab kyang mi byed par dam bca'o/_/rgyun
translated: confess what you are doing at present, and vow not to do it again in the future even at the cost of your life.

original: bshags dang yi ge brgya pas kyang bshags so/_/sdom pa gzung ba ni/_dkon
analyzed: bshags dang yi ge brgya pas kyang bshags so/_/sdom pa gzung ba ni/_dkon
translated: Also confess with the hundred-syllable mantra and the Confession of Downfalls.🔽The taking of vows is as follows: I go for refuge to the Three Jewels.

original: mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/_/sdig pa mi dge so sor bshags/_/dge ba
analyzed: mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/_/sdig pa mi dge so sor bshags/_/dge ba
translated: I confess each nonvirtue and misdeed.🔽I rejoice in all virtues.

original: kun la rjes yid rang /_/sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung /_/byang chub
analyzed: kun la rjes yid rang /_/sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung /_/byang chub
translated: I hold the mind of awakening.🔽I generate the mind of supreme awakening.

original: mchog gi sems ni skyed par bgyi/_/sems can thams cad bdag gis 'gron
analyzed: mchog gi sems ni skyed par bgyi/_/sems can thams cad bdag gis 'gron
translated: I will strive to liberate all sentient beings.🔽I will practice the delightful conduct of awakening.

original: du gnyer/_/byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi/_/'gro la phan phyir
analyzed: du gnyer/_/byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi/_/'gro la phan phyir
translated: May I attain buddhahood for the benefit of migrating beings.🔽Recite that three times.

original: sangs rgyas grub par shog_/zhes lan gsum brjod/_de nas gsol sngo/🔽rjes bskul gdab pa'o/_/man+dal rang gi spyi bor spung /_yul nyi shu rtsha bzhi'i
analyzed: sangs rgyas grub par shog_/zhes lan gsum brjod/_de nas gsol sngo/ rjes bskul gdab pa'o/_/man+dal rang gi spyi bor spung /_yul nyi shu rtsha bzhi'i
translated: Then the supplication,🔽and the urging.🔽Gather the mandala on the top of one’s head.

original: dkyil 'khor mchod pa man+dal gyi cho ga'o//_//
analyzed: dkyil 'khor mchod pa man+dal gyi cho ga'o//_//
translated: The mandala offering of the twenty-four sacred places is the mandala ritual.

original: bcom ldan 'das bde mchog la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/gtor ma byin gyis
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bde mchog la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/gtor ma byin gyis
translated: Homage to Bhagavat Cakrasaṃvara.🔽The consecration of the bali

original: brlab pa dang /_gtor mas mchod pa ni dang po rang dam tshhig gi dkyil 'khor
analyzed: brlab pa dang /_gtor mas mchod pa ni dang po rang dam tshhig gi dkyil 'khor
translated: and the offering with the bali: First, the self-empowerment maṇḍala🔽is the maṇḍala of the pledge beings.

original: gyi mdun du/_a las thod pa phyi dkar la nang dmar ba cig gi nang du phyogs
analyzed: gyi mdun du/_a las thod pa phyi dkar la nang dmar ba cig gi nang du phyogs
translated: In front of that, from A, is a skull cup, white on the outside and red on the inside.

original: bzhir bi mu ra shu ma las bdud rtshi lnga bskyed/_g+ho/_ku/_d+ha/_ha/_na
analyzed: bzhir bi mu ra shu ma las bdud rtshi lnga bskyed/_g+ho/_ku/_d+ha/_ha/_na
translated: In the four directions of the skull cup, from vi mu ra shu ma, the five nectars are generated.

original: las sha rnam pa lnga la sogs pa gtor ma'i rgyu rnams blugs la/_de'i steng du a
analyzed: las sha rnam pa lnga la sogs pa gtor ma'i rgyu rnams blugs la/_de'i steng du a
translated: From go ku dha ha na, the five types of meat and so on, the ingredients of the torma, are poured into the skull cup.🔽Upon that, from A, is a moon mandala.

original: las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kha gab kyi steng du hum las rdo rje rtshe lnga pa'i lte ba la hum
analyzed: las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kha gab kyi steng du hum las rdo rje rtshe lnga pa'i lte ba la hum
translated: Upon that, from hūṃ, is a five-tined vajra marked with hūṃ in the center.🔽Below that, there are three dry human heads as the hearth.

original: gis mtshhan pa gcig_bskyed/_'og tu mi mgo skam po gsum gyi sgyed po dang / de'i 'og tu ram las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa ram gyis mtshhan pa'i steng du/
analyzed: gis mtshhan pa gcig_bskyed/_'og tu mi mgo skam po gsum gyi sgyed po dang / de'i 'og tu ram las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa ram gyis mtshhan pa'i steng du/
translated: Below that, from raṃ, is a triangular fire mandala marked with raṃ.

original: yo las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu lta bu ba dan gyis mtshhan pa rnams bsam mo/_/
analyzed: yo las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu lta bu ba dan gyis mtshhan pa rnams bsam mo/_/
translated: Upon that, from yaṃ, is a bow-shaped air maṇḍala marked with pennants.

original: yam las rlung g.yos te ram las me 'bar bas thod pa'i nang gi rdzas khol te/_rang
analyzed: yam las rlung g.yos te ram las me 'bar bas thod pa'i nang gi rdzas khol te/_rang
translated: The wind from yaṃ stirs and the fire from raṃ blazes, boiling the substances in the skull cup.

original: gi spyi bo dang /_'grin pa dang /_snying ga rnams kyi 'od kyis dkar po dang / dmar po dang /_sngon por khol snying ga'i hum gi 'od kyis ye shes kyi bdud rtshi🔽rnam pa sna tshhogs bkug ste/_slar rdo rje dang /_zla ba yang zhu nas/_dam
analyzed: gi spyi bo dang /_'grin pa dang /_snying ga rnams kyi 'od kyis dkar po dang / dmar po dang /_sngon por khol snying ga'i hum gi 'od kyis ye shes kyi bdud rtshi rnam pa sna tshhogs bkug ste/_slar rdo rje dang /_zla ba yang zhu nas/_dam
translated: The light from the crown, throat, and heart centers boils up white, red, and blue, and the light from the hūṃ at the heart center invokes the elixir of timeless awareness.

original: tshhig dang ye shes gnyis dbyer med par bya ba'i phyir om a hum lan gsum brjod do//🔽gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa'o/_/'gron spyan drang ba ni/_rang dam tshhig gi
analyzed: tshhig dang ye shes gnyis dbyer med par bya ba'i phyir om a hum lan gsum brjod do// gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa'o/_/'gron spyan drang ba ni/_rang dam tshhig gi
translated: The vajra and moon melt again, and in order to make the pledge and timeless awareness beings inseparable, one recites oṃ aḥ hūṃ three times.🔽The consecration of the torma.🔽Inviting the guests.

original: dkyil 'khor/_'gro ba rigs drug kyang dpa' bo dpa' mor bskyed/_rkang pa
analyzed: dkyil 'khor/_'gro ba rigs drug kyang dpa' bo dpa' mor bskyed/_rkang pa
translated: The guests are the pledge beings of one’s own mandala and the six kinds of beings visualized as heroes and heroines.

original: g.yas kyis g.yon pa'i 'the bong mnan te/_lag pa gnyis dra ba'i phyag rgya🔽bcas te/_dmig gyen la zlog nas ngag tu/_om shi badzra he he ru ru kam d+ha ki
analyzed: g.yas kyis g.yon pa'i 'the bong mnan te/_lag pa gnyis dra ba'i phyag rgya bcas te/_dmig gyen la zlog nas ngag tu/_om shi badzra he he ru ru kam d+ha ki
translated: With the right foot pressing on the left thigh, the two hands form the net mudra,🔽and one looks upward while reciting:🔽oṃ śrī vajra he he ru ru ka maṭi kiṇi jvala sambhara phe phe

original: ni dz+wa la sam b+ha ra phe phe zhes brjod pas/_ye shes kyi 'khor lo gzhal yas khang
analyzed: ni dz+wa la sam b+ha ra phe phe zhes brjod pas/_ye shes kyi 'khor lo gzhal yas khang
translated: The timeless awareness beings enter the celestial palace.

original: dur khrod dang bcas pa dpag tu med pa nam mkha' sa gzhi khengs pa spyan drangs
analyzed: dur khrod dang bcas pa dpag tu med pa nam mkha' sa gzhi khengs pa spyan drangs
translated: Invite the immeasurable charnel grounds and their inhabitants to fill the sky and the earth.

original: te/_de dag la mchod pa lnga dngos sam yid kyis dbul/_de nas mchod bstod
analyzed: te/_de dag la mchod pa lnga dngos sam yid kyis dbul/_de nas mchod bstod
translated: Offer the five actual offerings or mentally emanated offerings to them.🔽Then perform the two offerings and praises,🔽the two confessions and vows,

original: gnyis/_bshags bsdams gnyis/_gsol sngo gnyis/_rjes bskul gnyis
analyzed: gnyis/_bshags bsdams gnyis/_gsol sngo gnyis/_rjes bskul gnyis
translated: the two supplications and dedications, and the two exhortations.

original: rgyas par bya'o/_/ de nas gtor ma dbul ba ni/_a+o~m badzra a ra l+li ho/_dza hum bam ho/
analyzed: rgyas par bya'o/_/ de nas gtor ma dbul ba ni/_a+o~m badzra a ra l+li ho/_dza hum bam ho/
translated: Then, to offer the torma, recite: Oṃ vajra aralli ho / ja hūṃ vaṃ ho /🔽vajra dakini / samaya stvaṃ / triśa ho / oṃ a hūṃ.

original: badzra da ki ni/_sa ma ya sto/_tri sha ho/_om a hum/_zhes lan lnga'i bar du
analyzed: badzra da ki ni/_sa ma ya sto/_tri sha ho/_om a hum/_zhes lan lnga'i bar du
translated: Repeat this five times.

original: gtor ma tshhogs mchod kyi dbu lags so//
analyzed: gtor ma tshhogs mchod kyi dbu lags so//
translated: This is the beginning of the feast offering.

original: mngon par bsngags la/_phyogs g.yas skor mtshhams g.yon bskor du dbul
analyzed: mngon par bsngags la/_phyogs g.yas skor mtshhams g.yon bskor du dbul
translated: Recite the mantra while offering the torma to the right and left.

original: bar bya'o/_/de nas dur khrod brgyad la dbul ba ni/_om kha kha kha hi kha hi sarba
analyzed: bar bya'o/_/de nas dur khrod brgyad la dbul ba ni/_om kha kha kha hi kha hi sarba
translated: Then, to offer to the eight charnel grounds, recite: Oṃ kha kha khāhi khāhi sarva /

original: yak+sha rak+sha sarba b+hu ta pre ta/_pi sha tshe/_ud ma tam/_a pa sma ra/_d+ha ki bya/
analyzed: yak+sha rak+sha sarba b+hu ta pre ta/_pi sha tshe/_ud ma tam/_a pa sma ra/_d+ha ki bya/
translated: yakṣa rakṣa sarva bhūta preta / piśāca uṃ tama / apa sma ra / dāki bya /

original: d+ha ya i mam b+ha ling g+hin+na du/_sa ma ya rak+sha na du/_ma ma sarba sid dam me/_pra
analyzed: d+ha ya i mam b+ha ling g+hin+na du/_sa ma ya rak+sha na du/_ma ma sarba sid dam me/_pra
translated: Mama sarva siddham me,🔽Pra🔽Yedha tshana dhu,🔽Yate vam,🔽Yate tsot,

original: yad tshan du/_ya te bam/_ya te stsho/_'bun dza tha/_pi pa tha/_dzi kra tha/
analyzed: yad tshan du/_ya te bam/_ya te stsho/_'bun dza tha/_pi pa tha/_dzi kra tha/
translated: Bun dza tha,🔽Pipa tha,🔽Jikra tha,🔽Mati krama tha,🔽Mama sarva kṛya dhaya,🔽Susukham,

original: ma ti kra ma tha/_ma ma sarba kar+ya d+ha ya/_sad su kham/_bi shud d+ha ye/_sa ha yi/
analyzed: ma ti kra ma tha/_ma ma sarba kar+ya d+ha ya/_sad su kham/_bi shud d+ha ye/_sa ha yi/
translated: Viśudhaya,🔽Sahāyi,🔽Kabhavan dhuṃ huṃ phaṭ.

original: ka b+ha ban d+ha hu~m hu~m phat/_zhes lan gsum brjod la dur khrod brgyad la dbul lo//🔽de nas ma mo zhing skyong dang phyogs skyong srungs ma spyan drang bar bya ste/_lcags
analyzed: ka b+ha ban d+ha hu~m hu~m phat/_zhes lan gsum brjod la dur khrod brgyad la dbul lo// de nas ma mo zhing skyong dang phyogs skyong srungs ma spyan drang bar bya ste/_lcags
translated: Recite this three times and offer it to the eight charnel grounds.

original: kyu'i phyag rgya bcas la spyan drang ba'i sngags/_a+o ka ka kan d+ha na/_b+ha ba b+ha na
analyzed: kyu'i phyag rgya bcas la spyan drang ba'i sngags/_a+o ka ka kan d+ha na/_b+ha ba b+ha na
translated: Then, invite the field-born mamos, the directional guardians, and the protectors, with the hook mudra and the invocation mantra: Oka kan dhana,🔽Bhava bhana🔽Dhana, kha kha khan dhana,

original: d+ha na/_kha kha khan d+ha na/_sarba dus sta nam/_ha na ha na/_g+ha ta ya g+ha ta ya/
analyzed: d+ha na/_kha kha khan d+ha na/_sarba dus sta nam/_ha na ha na/_g+ha ta ya g+ha ta ya/
translated: Sarva dus tanam, hana hana, ghataya ghataya,🔽Amoghasahya hum ja.

original: a mo g+ha sa hum dza zhes pas bkug la/_phyogs 'tshhams su pad+ma'i gdan la
analyzed: a mo g+ha sa hum dza zhes pas bkug la/_phyogs 'tshhams su pad+ma'i gdan la
translated: Having summoned them, on the boundary line, on a lotus seat,

original: bzhugs par bsams la mchod pa lngar byin gyis brlabs pa de nyid dbul te/
analyzed: bzhugs par bsams la mchod pa lngar byin gyis brlabs pa de nyid dbul te/
translated: Imagine that they are present and offer the five offerings consecrated by those mantras.🔽After the mantras, offer with “May so-and-so be pacified.

original: sngags de nyid kyi 'jug la/_a mo ka s+ya shan ting ku ru hum hum phat phat swa ha zhes
analyzed: sngags de nyid kyi 'jug la/_a mo ka s+ya shan ting ku ru hum hum phat phat swa ha zhes
translated: Hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.”

original: pas dbul te so so'i lce la hum las rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la/_lce'i sbu gu'i
analyzed: pas dbul te so so'i lce la hum las rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la/_lce'i sbu gu'i
translated: Consecrate the vajra on each of their tongues with hūṃ and imagine that the light of the tube of the tongue🔽extracts the poison and makes an offering.

original: 'od kyis bdud rtshi drangs te mchod par bsams la/_bdud rtshis mchod pa ni/
analyzed: 'od kyis bdud rtshi drangs te mchod par bsams la/_bdud rtshis mchod pa ni/
translated: The offering of poison is:🔽oṃ kṣetrapāla pāṇḍita amṛta khahi seven times.

original: a+o~m khye tra pa la pan tshan a mri ta kha hi zhes lan bdun/_chang gis mchod pa ni/
analyzed: a+o~m khye tra pa la pan tshan a mri ta kha hi zhes lan bdun/_chang gis mchod pa ni/
translated: The offering of beer is:🔽oṃ kṣetrapāla madana khahi.

original: om khye tra pa la ma da na kha hi gtor mas 7mchod pa ni/_om khye tra pa la i mam b+ha
analyzed: om khye tra pa la ma da na kha hi gtor mas 7mchod pa ni/_om khye tra pa la i mam b+ha
translated: The offering of torma is:🔽oṃ kṣetrapāla imaṃ baliṃ trāṃ sarva satva namo’stu te tathā kṣānti svāhā.

original: ling spru na sarba sad ta nam shan ta te tsha ta khye na swa ha/_de nas stod pa bya ste/
analyzed: ling spru na sarba sad ta nam shan ta te tsha ta khye na swa ha/_de nas stod pa bya ste/
translated: Then, make the praise:🔽“In a charnel ground, a solitary tree, a mountain, a mountain cave, a village,

original: a+o shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang /_/ri bo dang ni ri sul dang /_/grong
analyzed: a+o shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang /_/ri bo dang ni ri sul dang /_/grong
translated: a forest, or a charnel ground,

original: dang bzhi mdo nyid dang ni/_khyad par du ni khang stong dang /_/rdol pa'i
analyzed: dang bzhi mdo nyid dang ni/_khyad par du ni khang stong dang /_/rdol pa'i
translated: In the middle of the crossroads,🔽and especially in empty houses,🔽in holes, on plains,🔽and especially in water.

original: gnas dang thang dang ni/_/khyad par du ni chu la gnas/_/nag mo drag mo drag
analyzed: gnas dang thang dang ni/_/khyad par du ni chu la gnas/_/nag mo drag mo drag
translated: The black one, the fierce one, the very fierce one,🔽the one who is served like a god,🔽the black one, the one with bared fangs, the ugly one,🔽the one who transgresses the command, and the one who leads astray,🔽the old one, the fierce one,

original: chen mo/_/lha bzhin mnyam du sten pa dang /_/nag mo rtshigs dang mi sdug dang / bka' las 'das dang log 'dren rnams/_/rgan byed mo dang drag mo dang /_/ mi sdug ma dang ud ma dang /_/rgyal ma rnam par rgyal ma dang /_/mi thub
analyzed: chen mo/_/lha bzhin mnyam du sten pa dang /_/nag mo rtshigs dang mi sdug dang / bka' las 'das dang log 'dren rnams/_/rgan byed mo dang drag mo dang /_/ mi sdug ma dang ud ma dang /_/rgyal ma rnam par rgyal ma dang /_/mi thub
translated: the ugly one, the lotus one,🔽the victorious one, the completely victorious one,🔽the one who cannot be conquered,🔽and the one who cannot be conquered by others,🔽the black one, the good one, the very black one,🔽the thick black one, the yoginī,🔽the powerful one, the moon one,

analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub ma/_/nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo/_/nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor ma/_/dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo/_/drag tu sdang dang 'phyar ba mo/_/
translated: the very angry one, the haughty one,🔽the snatcher, the lamp one,

original: 'phrog ma dang ni mar me ma/_/'jigs byed ma dang rnal 'byor ma/_/nag
analyzed: 'phrog ma dang ni mar me ma/_/'jigs byed ma dang rnal 'byor ma/_/nag
translated: the terrifying one, the yoginī,🔽the black one, the one with a great form,🔽the bared fangs one, the great skull one,🔽the skull one, the great skull one,🔽the one with a skull in her hand,

analyzed: mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo/_/mche ba rtshigs dang thod chen mo/_/thod
translated: the one with a skull garland,🔽the one with a skull crown,🔽the one with a skull rosary,🔽the one with a skull seat,🔽the one with a skull staff,🔽the one with a skull banner,🔽the one with a skull flag,🔽the one with a skull mirror,🔽the one with a skull mirror stand,🔽the one with a skull vessel,🔽the one with a skull vessel stand,🔽the one with a skull garland,🔽the one with a skull garland stand,🔽the one with a skull crown,🔽the one with a skull crown stand,🔽the one with a skull rosary,🔽the one with a skull rosary stand,🔽the one with a skull seat,🔽the one with a skull seat stand,🔽the one with a skull staff,🔽the one with a skull staff stand,🔽the one with a skull banner,🔽the one with a skull banner stand,🔽the one with a skull flag,🔽the one with a skull flag stand,🔽the one with a skull mirror,🔽the one with a skull mirror stand,🔽the one with a skull vessel,🔽the one with a skull vessel stand,🔽the one with a skull garland,🔽the one with a skull garland stand,🔽the one with a skull crown,🔽the one with a skull crown

original: 'phreng can dang khwa gdong ma/_/sbrul chen ral gri dgra sta bcas/_/de bzhin🔽rdo rje'i gzhu chen ma/_/de bzhin chen mo mkha' 'gro ma/_/las kun rjes su

translated: the one with a garland, the one with a crow face, the great snake, the sword, and the one with the enemy’s head,🔽the great vajra bow, and likewise the great ḍākinī,🔽who is engaged in all activities,🔽

original: bsgrub byed ma/_/de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtsho/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
analyzed: bsgrub byed ma/_/de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtsho/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
translated: The four goddesses, the great vajra bow, the great dakini, the one who accomplishes all activities, the vajra lords, and the great bodies of the tathagatas,

original: chen te/_/rdul med rnal 'byor zhi ba mo/_/rdo rje dbang mo bka' 'di yis/_/
analyzed: chen te/_/rdul med rnal 'byor zhi ba mo/_/rdo rje dbang mo bka' 'di yis/_/
translated: the stainless yoginis, the peaceful ones, by this command of the vajra queen,🔽all without exception gather here.

original: thams cad ma lus 'dir 'dus shig_/de nas chos bshad bya ste/_chos
analyzed: thams cad ma lus 'dir 'dus shig_/de nas chos bshad bya ste/_chos
translated: Then the Dharma should be explained:

analyzed: rnams sgyu ma lta bu ste/_/dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/_/bzung du med cing
translated: “All phenomena are like illusions, pure, clear, and unclouded, ungraspable,🔽uncuttable, arisen from causes and karma.”

original: bcad du med/_/rgyu dang las la yang dag byung /_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa
analyzed: bcad du med/_/rgyu dang las la yang dag byung /_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa

analyzed: brjod/_/smon lam gdab ste/_sems can thams cad sdig med cing /_/
translated: Make aspirations: “May all sentient beings be free from negativity,🔽may all sentient beings be happy,

original: sems can thams cad bde gyur cig_/rang lam nyid nas grol ba yi/_/
analyzed: sems can thams cad bde gyur cig_/rang lam nyid nas grol ba yi/_/
translated: may they be liberated from their own paths.”

original: sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad par shog_/ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang /_/ma
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad par shog_/ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang /_/ma
translated: May I meet with the state of Buddhahood.🔽Those who are not liberated, I shall liberate;🔽those who are not freed, I shall free.

original: grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/_/da lta nyid du rjes brtshe bas/_/rnal 'byor
analyzed: grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/_/da lta nyid du rjes brtshe bas/_/rnal 'byor
translated: Right now, I shall place🔽the teachings and the Dharma in the yoga.

analyzed: bstan chos gnas la dgod/_/zhes lan gsum brjod/_gtor ma byin gyis
translated: Recite this three times.🔽The consecration of the torma

analyzed: brlab pa dang /_gtor mas mchod pa'i cho ga'o/
translated: and the ritual of offering the torma.🔽Composed by the great Indian scholar
